quizes.description: A simple quiz to test your knowledge of geography.

questions.question_text: Which city is known as the Big Apple?
questions.explanation: New York City is commonly referred to as the Big Apple.

questions.question_text: Is Mount Everest the tallest mountain in the world?
questions.explanation: Yes, Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.
The capital of France is Paris.

quizes.description: Test your knowledge of basic JavaScript concepts.

questions.question_text: What is the correct syntax to create a function in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: The correct syntax to declare a function is 'function myFunction()'.

questions.question_text: Is 'null' a type of object in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: 'null' is indeed considered an object type in JavaScript.

questions.question_text: Type the keyword used to declare a variable in JavaScript.
questions.explanation: The keyword 'var' is used to declare a variable in JavaScript.
